mapping.sql: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR (T.CREATE_DATETIME, 1, 4) AS "CREATEYEAR" FROM VIEW_ALL_KPI_HIS T WHERE T.KPI_CODE = #kpi_code# ORDER BY CREATEYEAR DESC

SELECT CONCAT(CONCAT(SUBSTR(T.CREATE_DATETIME, 5,2),'-'),SUBSTR(T.CREATE_DATETIME, 7,2)) AS "CREATETIME", T.KPI_NAME AS "KPI_NAME", T.KPI_VERSION AS "KPI_VERSION", T.KPI_CALIBER AS "KPI_CALIBER", T.KPI_EXPLAIN AS "KPI_EXPLAIN" FROM VIEW_ALL_KPI_HIS T WHERE T.KPI_CODE = #kpi_code# AND T.CREATE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT(#histime.CREATEYEAR#,'%') ORDER BY CAST(T.KPI_VERSION AS INTEGER) DESC
